summary: Actionable checklist for SEO metadata, technical optimization, and compliance policies.

core_principles.description: All metadata must tell consistent story for algorithmic understanding
Titles, descriptions, and tags enable search discoverability
Captions, timestamps, and file names provide indexing depth
Adherence to spam and deceptive practices policies prevents penalties
Links and structure drive extended viewing sessions

techniques.name: Title SEO Checklist
techniques.description: Essential title optimization for search and CTR

items.action: Primary keyword within first 5 words
items.verification: Keyword appears early in title string

items.action: Title length 60-70 characters (fits mobile without truncation)
Contains psychological trigger word (power word)
items.verification: Power word selected from category list

items.action: Uses SEO-Hook or Multi-Trigger formula structure
Title content delivered in first 30 seconds of video
No deceptive or clickbait claims not fulfilled
Unique and not generic from channel

techniques.name: Description SEO Checklist
techniques.description: Description content for indexing and conversion

items.action: Mini-blog 200-300 words for long-tail keywords
items.verification: Word count meets minimum, includes related keywords

items.action: First 150 characters (above fold) contains main keyword and value prop
items.verification: Intro line optimized for search preview

items.action: No generic intro phrases ('Welcome to channel')
items.verification: First lines dive directly into value

items.action: Timestamps starting at 00:00 with minimum 3 chapters
items.verification: Timestamp list present, each chapter 10s minimum

items.action: Link hierarchy followed (Resources → Recirculation → Disclosures → Socials)
Sponsorship disclosure clear and conspicuous
Hashtags limited to 3-5 relevant tags

techniques.name: Technical Metadata Checklist
techniques.description: Hidden metadata elements for indexing depth

items.action: Custom captions (SRT) uploaded (not just auto-captions)
Tags limited to 5-8 highly relevant terms
items.verification: Tag count 5-8, all relevant to content

items.action: Tags used for misspellings and variations
Thumbnail accurately depicts content
File name keyword-rich before upload
items.verification: Filename uses keywords, not generic name

items.action: Translated captions for target markets if applicable
All metadata aligns on same keywords and topics
items.verification: Consistent story across title, description, captions, tags

items.action: Title promise fulfilled in video (no bait-and-switch)
items.verification: Content review confirms delivery of promise

items.action: No tag stuffing (dozens of irrelevant tags)
Thumbnail depicts actual content (no fake thumbnails)
Sponsorship clearly disclosed in video and description
items.verification: Oral disclosure in first 30s, text near links

items.action: No links to scam or harmful sites
items.verification: All external links vetted and safe

items.action: Famous figures in thumbnail appear in video
Affiliate links disclosed appropriately

techniques.name: Session Time Optimization Checklist
techniques.description: Metadata features that drive extended viewing sessions

items.action: Recirculation links to channel content (videos, playlists)
Playlists created for content series
End screen with related content recommendations
items.verification: End screen configured with suggested videos

items.action: Cards for related content throughout video
External link priority minimized (kept at bottom)
items.verification: Off-platform links placed last in description

references.source: YouTube Spam, Deceptive Practices, & Scams Policy
